studio.config.title: Studio
studio.config.rendering.frame_rate-comme: At what frame rate BBS will render the picture
studio.config.rendering.render_quality-c: How detailed the picture quality is
studio.config.rendering.terrain_debug-co: Whether terrain debug information (such as volume boxes and chunk coordinates) should be rendered
studio.config.rendering.title: Rendering
studio.config.rendering.vsync-comment: Whether vertical synchronization should be enabled. Vertical synchronization (aka v-sync) is a technology that attempts to fix screen tearing
studio.ui.language.editor.missing: Display only the missing (not translated) strings
studio.ui.language.editor.paste-descript: Paste JSON which will replace current language strings. §5IMPORTANT§r: make a back up just in case, as given JSON §imight§r replace your work.
studio.ui.language.editor.save: Save edited strings to a language editor folder
studio.ui.language.editor.title: Language editor (%s)
studio.ui.utility.compile_lang-descripti: Language files were compiled to export folder. Would you like to open it?
studio.ui.utility.title: Utility panel
studio.ui.welcome.keys-subtitle: Hover over the keys to see what they are doing...
studio.ui.welcome.patrons:
Huge thanks goes to §8BBS§r' Patrons who make development possible! Thank you very much!

%s
studio.ui.welcome.resources-subtitle: Have fun creating new stuff! If you encounter bugs or have questions about §8BBS§r, here are some §cexternal resources§r that you can visit:
studio.ui.welcome.resources-tip: You can open this screen again by pressing \
studio.ui.welcome.welcome-subtitle: §8BBS§r is a voxel sandbox/game engine with heavy focus on singleplayer experience and tools for creators. Machinimas? Mini-games? Adventure maps? §8BBS§r got you covered!
studio.ui.welcome.main_features.and_more: There is so much more to BBS! Look around, or ask on community Discord server!
studio.ui.welcome.main_features.blockben: Blockbench is a model editor perfect for voxel-like models, which allows model, texture and animate all in one application. Its models can be exported to BBS with animations!
studio.ui.welcome.main_features.camera-d: In-game cinematics are cool, which is why BBS offers a non-linear camera editor with many tools to help you create camera paths!
studio.ui.welcome.main_features.dialogue: For adventure games, dialogue is one of the best mechanic to tell a story. BBS features node-based dialogue editor, which allows creating pretty dynamic dialogues.
studio.ui.welcome.main_features.particle: BBS offers a simple particle editor based on Snowstorm particle editor, which offers a plethora of features like math expressions, curves, gradients, and more!
studio.ui.welcome.main_features.scriptin: Game logic requires programming. BBS has a scripting system which uses Java's Nashorn JavaScript scripting engine, which allows you to program within.
studio.ui.welcome.main_features.tile_set: Tile sets allow you to provide blocks that can be placed in the world. Not only that, each world can have its own tile set without the need to share the same block models.
studio.ui.welcome.main_features.triggers: Many components provide a way to attach a response when a certain action happens, that's where triggers come in and let you choose what happens.
studio.ui.welcome.main_features.world_ed: This full-featured editor allows you to manipulate large volume of blocks much efficiently. There is undo/redo, copy-paste, brushes, selection, and much more!
studio.ui.welcome.main_keys.escape: Escape - opens main dashboard, but also to close UI menus.
studio.ui.welcome.main_keys.f1: F1 - hides all of the UI elements in the dashboard, or debug info in the world.
studio.ui.welcome.main_keys.f2: F2 - screenshots the screen (supports transparency). Alt + F2 to screenshot to copy-paste buffer.
studio.ui.welcome.main_keys.f4: F4 - toggles video recording (you need to configure ffmpeg first in main dashboard).
studio.ui.welcome.main_keys.f9: F9 - toggles visibility of currently available keybinds list within UIs.
keybinds.config.welcome.title: Welcome menu
keybinds.config.welcome.tooltip: Keybinds that are available in welcome menu
